channel.title: High throughput screening on Pushkar Ghanekar
channel.description: Recent content in High throughput screening on Pushkar Ghanekar

item.title: Estimating thermodynamic stability of Perovskites
item.description: High throughput screening of MaterialsProject dataset using pymatgen API to estimate perovskite bulk stability. For selected candidates, the surface morphology is investigated using ab-initio thermodynamic analysis.
